name: Darth vader ბიუსტი
description: Turn your favorite photo into a stunning 3D printed lithophane. When backlit, your image comes to life with incredible detail. Perfect for gifts and keepsakes.

name: საფანქრე
description: A flexible, articulated dragon that can be posed in countless ways. A fantastic desk toy or decorative piece for fantasy lovers.

name: კვერცხის შესანახი
description: A beautiful and intricate vase designed with a Voronoi pattern. This modern piece is a guaranteed conversation starter and adds a touch of elegance to any room.

name: ღვინის დამჭერი ხელი
description: A clever and stylish self-watering planter. The two-part design provides a water reservoir to keep your plants happy and hydrated.

name: Headphone Stand
description: A sleek and sturdy stand to store your headphones. Keeps your desk organized and prevents damage to your gear. Available in multiple colors.

name: Custom Name Keychain
description: Personalize your keys with a custom 3D printed name keychain. A simple, durable, and thoughtful gift for anyone.

name: Cable Management Clips (10 pcs)
description: Tame the cable chaos behind your desk or TV with this set of 10 durable cable management clips. Easy to install and incredibly useful.

name: Flexi-Rex Dinosaur
description: A classic 3D print, the Flexi-Rex is a fun, flexible Tyrannosaurus Rex toy that can stand on its own. Kids and adults love it!

name: Modular Desk Organizer
description: A customizable modular organizer for your desk. Arrange the different compartments to perfectly fit your pens, notes, and other supplies.
